Home Libraries People FAQ More
value::emplace_string

Return a reference to a string, changing the kind and replacing the contents.

Synopsis 
string&
emplace_string();
Description

The value is replaced with an empty string using the current memory resource, destroying the previous contents.

Complexity

Linear in the size of *this.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
